short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you to manage your tabs and be more productive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will help the user to manage multiple tabs and groups effortlessly and provide a better view for the same. The user can also search for tabs and URLs across all the windows.
